C0P.SG.short_name: Central Plaza Hotel PCL Reg. Sh
C0P.SG.long_name: Central Plaza Hotel Public Company Limited
C0P.SG.summary: Central Plaza Hotel Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, operates in the hotel business in Thailand and internationally. It operates in two segments, Hotel and Related Services Operation; and Food and Ice-Cream. As of December 31, 2020, the company operated or developed 84 hotels and resorts with 17,358 rooms under the Centara Hotels & Resorts brand across 14 countries. It is also involved in the food and beverage, hotel management, and import and export businesses, as well as operates a spa. The company was founded in 1980 and is based in Bangkok, Thailand.

SHR.BK.short_name: S HOTELS AND RESORTS PUBLIC COM
SHR.BK.long_name: S Hotels and Resorts Public Company Limited
SHR.BK.summary: S Hotels and Resorts Public Company Limited engages in the investment, hospitality, and related businesses in Thailand and internationally. It offers a portfolio of 39 properties to guests in the Republic of Maldives, the Republic of Fiji, the Republic of Mauritius, the United Kingdom, and Thailand. The company is based in Bangkok, Thailand. S Hotels and Resorts Public Company Limited is a subsidiary of Singha Estate Public Company Limited.
